Elected president of the People's Republic of China.
Chairman of the 16th CPC Central Committee and the Central Military Commission.
Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC.
Makes the first visit to Japan by a Chinese leader in 10 years.
Hu makes a two-day visit to Cuba.
He meets with former President Fidel Castro and promises that China will provide Cuba with $78 million in donations and credit.
Meets President Barack Obama for the first time during economic summit in London.
Travels to the United States for a four-day visit.
